title: 112_hr3483
content: The "Veterans Education Equity Act of 2011" ensures equity for tuition and fees for individuals receiving assistance under the Post-9/11 Educational Assistance Program at institutions of higher learning. The "Veterans Education Equity Act of 2011" amends the calculation of tuition and fees for education programs at public institutions of higher learning for individuals receiving assistance under the Post-9/11 Educational Assistance Program. The "Veterans Education Equity Act of 2011" amends the calculation of tuition and fees for education programs at public institutions of higher learning for individuals receiving assistance under the Post-9/11 Educational Assistance Program. It includes provisions for aid designated for defraying tuition and fees. The "Veterans Education Equity Act of 2011" amends the calculation of tuition and fees for education programs at public institutions of higher learning for individuals receiving assistance under the Post-9/11 Educational Assistance Program by considering the actual net cost for in-State tuition and fees after application of certain provisions. The "Veterans Education Equity Act of 2011" amends tuition and fees calculation for education programs at public institutions for individuals receiving assistance under the Post-9/11 Educational Assistance Program, including waivers or reductions in tuition and fees. The "Veterans Education Equity Act of 2011" amends tuition and fees calculation for education programs at public institutions for individuals receiving assistance under the Post-9/11 Educational Assistance Program, including scholarships and aid provided directly to the institution. The "Veterans Education Equity Act of 2011" amends tuition and fees calculation for education programs at public institutions for individuals receiving assistance under the Post-9/11 Educational Assistance Program, specifically designated for defraying tuition and fees. The "Veterans Education Equity Act of 2011" amends tuition and fees calculation for education programs at public institutions for individuals receiving assistance under the Post-9/11 Educational Assistance Program, setting the amount at $17,500 for the academic year starting on August 1, 2011. The "Veterans Education Equity Act of 2011" sets the tuition and fees amount at $17,500 for the academic year starting on August 1, 2011, with subsequent years adjusted based on percentage increases determined under section 3015(h) of this title. The amendment made by subsection (a) applies to educational assistance payments for academic years starting after the enactment of the Act.
